name: Percy Lancaster 3D
description:
I am writing a game in the atmosphere of the old "Prince of Persia" 1989. If you liked this game, then download the free prototype, sign up and support the work of reviving the spirit of the great game!

The action takes place mainly underground at different levels. And in the final part the events are transferred to the surface of the planet and into space.

The main character is temporary taken from example and he still does not know how to jump and to swim, but I will definitely teach him. Stay tuned!

At the moment you can play a small demo level compiled as executable for Windows on Webkit. Find red key and open a door with red light with it
